News.Title: Bajaj Holdings Q3 Net Profit Surges 114% to ₹1.8B
News.Summary: Bajaj Holdings & Investment reports strong Q3 performance with net profit jumping 114% to ₹1.8 billion and revenue rising 134% to ₹2.81 billion year-on-year, demonstrating robust growth.

News.Title: Bajaj Finserv completes ₹21,390-cr Allianz buyout
News.Summary: Bajaj Finserv completed acquisition of Allianz SE's 23% stake in insurance subsidiaries for ₹21,390 crore on January 8, ending 24-year JV and raising group ownership to 97%.

News.Title: Bajaj Holdings Board Meet Set for Feb 4 for Q3 Results
News.Summary: Bajaj Holdings & Investment Limited has scheduled its board meeting for February 4, 2026, to consider Q3FY26 financial results. Trading window closed from January 1-February 6, 2026.

News.Title: Bajaj Holdings & Investment Executes ₹116.73 Crore Block Trade on NSE
News.Summary: Bajaj Holdings & Investment Ltd. completed a block trade worth ₹116.73 crores involving approximately 105,253 shares at ₹11,090 per share on the NSE. The transaction represents a significant institutional trade in the company's shares at the specified price point.

News.Title: Bajaj Holdings Reports 66% Jump in H1 FY26 Profit to ₹5,046 Crore, Pays ₹65 Per Share Interim Dividend
News.Summary: Bajaj Holdings & Investment Ltd reported consolidated profit after tax of ₹5,046 crore for H1 FY26 versus ₹3,047 crore in H1 FY25, boosted by ₹1,522 crore profit from sale of Bajaj Finserv shares and strong performance across automobile and financial services businesses. The company declared and paid an interim dividend of ₹65 per equity share (650%) amounting to ₹723 crore, while progressing towards acquiring Allianz's 26% stake in two insurance companies.

News.Title: Bajaj Holdings Reports Strong Q2 Results, Sells Bajaj Finserv Stake for ₹1,995 Crore
News.Summary: Bajaj Holdings Investment Limited reported consolidated profit after tax of ₹1,559 crore in Q2 versus ₹1,436 crore in the previous year. For the half year, consolidated profit reached ₹5,046 crore compared to ₹3,047 crore. The company sold 1.04 crore equity shares of associate Bajaj Finserv Limited for ₹2,002 crore through a block deal, generating net profit of ₹1,983 crore. Standalone profit after tax was ₹2,181 crore for Q2 and ₹4,217 crore for the half year. The Board declared an interim dividend of ₹65 per equity share (650%), amounting to ₹723 crore, which was paid in October. The company is applying to Reserve Bank of India for re-categorization as an Unregistered Core Investment Company and has been realigning its investment portfolio accordingly.

News.Title: Bajaj Holdings & Investment Executes ₹62.42 Crore Block Trade on NSE
News.Summary: Bajaj Holdings & Investment Ltd. completed a block trade worth ₹62.42 crores on the National Stock Exchange. The transaction involved approximately 52,461 shares at a price of ₹11,898 per share.

News.Title: Bajaj Holdings & Investment Limited Amends Code for Fair Disclosure of Price Sensitive Information
News.Summary: Bajaj Holdings & Investment Limited's Board of Directors approved amendments to the company's Code of Practices and Procedures for Fair Disclosure of Unpublished Price Sensitive Information on September 16, 2025. The amended code establishes principles for determining legitimate purposes for sharing unpublished price sensitive information, including sharing with auditors, regulatory authorities, legal advisors, and other business partners in the ordinary course of business. Key provisions include maintaining a structured digital database of persons with whom such information is shared, ensuring prompt public disclosure of price-sensitive information, and appointing the Compliance Officer as Chief Investor Relations Officer. The code requires recipients of unpublished price sensitive information to be treated as insiders under SEBI regulations and mandates confidentiality agreements. The updated policy is available on the company's website.

News.Title: Bajaj Holdings Announces Rs 65 Interim Dividend with September 22 Record Date
News.Summary: Bajaj Holdings and Investment Ltd. declared an interim dividend of Rs 65 per share for financial year 2026. The company set September 22 as the record date for dividend eligibility. Shareholders on record as of this date will be entitled to receive the dividend payment.

News.Title: Bajaj Holdings & Investment Shareholders Approve All Resolutions at 80th AGM
News.Summary: Bajaj Holdings & Investment Limited held its 80th Annual General Meeting on August 6, 2025, where all six proposed resolutions were passed with overwhelming majority. The approved resolutions included adoption of audited financial statements for the year ended March 31, 2025, declaration of final dividend of Rs. 28 per equity share, re-appointment of directors Niraj Ramkrishna Bajaj and Rajivnayan Rahulkumar Bajaj who retired by rotation, appointment of Khandelwal Jain & Co. as statutory auditors from 80th AGM till 83rd AGM, and appointment of DVD & Associates as secretarial auditor for five consecutive years. The meeting had 75,217 total shareholders on record date with 102 shareholders present either in person or through proxy. Remote e-voting was available from August 2-5, 2025, with additional e-voting facility provided during the AGM for members who had not voted remotely.

News.Title: Bajaj Holdings Reports ₹2,036 Crore Standalone Profit in Q1 FY26, Driven by Bajaj Finserv Stake Sale
News.Summary: Bajaj Holdings & Investment Limited reported standalone profit after tax of ₹2,036 crore for the quarter ended June 30, 2025, compared to ₹66 crore in the same period last year. The significant increase was primarily driven by an exceptional gain of ₹1,983 crore from the sale of 1.04 crore equity shares of associate company Bajaj Finserv Limited through a block deal for ₹2,002.21 crore. Consolidated profit after tax reached ₹3,487 crore versus ₹1,610 crore in Q1 FY25. The company's total income increased to ₹308 crore from ₹139 crore year-on-year. BHIL is transitioning from an Investment and Credit Company to an Unregistered Core Investment Company as per RBI guidelines. The company's investment portfolio had a market value of ₹234,603 crore as of June 30, 2025, with a Net Asset Value of ₹21,080 per share. Bajaj Finserv continues to remain an associate of BHIL despite the partial stake sale.

News.Title: Bajaj Holdings & Investment Reports 30x Jump in Quarterly Net Profit to 20.4 Billion Rupees
News.Summary: Bajaj Holdings & Investment reported quarterly net profit of 20.4 billion rupees compared to 659.7 million rupees in the same period last year. Revenue increased to 2.95 billion rupees from 1.26 billion rupees year-over-year. The company recorded an exceptional item of 19.8 billion rupees during the quarter. Profit before exceptional items and tax stood at 2.6 billion rupees versus 896 million rupees in the previous year.

News.Title: Bajaj Holdings & Investment's Company Secretary Sriram Subbramaniam Resigns to Pursue Career Opportunities
News.Summary: Sriram Subbramaniam has resigned from his positions as Company Secretary, Compliance Officer, and Nodal Officer at Bajaj Holdings & Investment Limited. He submitted his resignation letter on April 30, 2025, and will be relieved from his responsibilities effective July 25, 2025. Subbramaniam cited pursuing alternate career opportunities outside the organization as the reason for his departure. The company is currently in the process of identifying and hiring a suitable replacement for these positions and will inform stock exchanges once the vacancy is filled.

News.Title: Bajaj Holdings: Last Day to Qualify for Rs 28 Per Share Dividend
News.Summary: June 26 is the last day to buy Bajaj Holdings shares to qualify for the Rs 28 per share final dividend for FY2025. The record date is June 27, with a total dividend payout of Rs 311 crore. The company recently sold 0.65% stake in Bajaj Finserv for Rs 2,002.21 crore.

News.Title: Bajaj Holdings & Investment Ltd. Block Trade on NSE
News.Summary: A block trade of approximately 107,160 shares of Bajaj Holdings & Investment Ltd. occurred on the National Stock Exchange (NSE) for Rs. 152.41 crores. The trade was executed at a price of Rs. 14,223.00 per share.

News.Title: Bajaj Holdings & Investment Announces Q4 Results and Dividend
News.Summary: Bajaj Holdings & Investment has declared a dividend of 28 rupees per share. The company reported consolidated net profit of 17 billion rupees for Q4, compared to 27 billion rupees in the same quarter last year. The share of profits from associates increased to 16.1 billion rupees from 15.5 billion rupees year-over-year.

News.Title: Bajaj Holdings & Investment Ltd. Block Trade on NSE
News.Summary: A block trade of approximately 26,256 shares of Bajaj Holdings & Investment Ltd. was executed on the National Stock Exchange (NSE) at a price of Rs. 10,587.50 per share. The total value of the transaction amounted to Rs. 27.80 crores.

News.Title: Bajaj Holdings & Investment Reports Q3 Financial Results
News.Summary: Bajaj Holdings & Investment has announced its Q3 financial results. The company reported a net profit of 840 million rupees, up from 656 million rupees in the same quarter last year. However, this represents a significant decrease from the previous quarter's 10.5 billion rupees. Revenue for Q3 stood at 1.2 billion rupees, an increase from 1.01 billion rupees in the year-ago period.

News.Title: Bajaj Holdings & Investment Reports Q3 Profit and Revenue Growth
News.Summary: Bajaj Holdings & Investment has reported a significant increase in its Q3 net profit, rising to 840 million rupees from 656 million rupees year-over-year. However, this represents a decrease from the previous quarter's 10.5 billion rupees. The company's Q3 revenue also saw growth, reaching 1.2 billion rupees compared to 1.01 billion rupees in the same period last year.
